title: Dolor Amarus

Weapon Enchantment +2

Once wielded by a murderer, the weapon's handle retains an eerie, clammy warmth, as if Dolor's pre-slaughter sweat somehow crept into the leather - and lingers there still.

Dagger Light Finesse Thrown

Dolor Amarus is one of the Dagger Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable,
